attributes.additional_details:
Since the sad and untimely death of Freddie Mercury, the flamboyant lead singer of Queen. We the signed believe that he has been a huge part of our culture and an inspiring character to us all and indeed within the music business, in his life and now in his death. He has inspired many new bands and musicians to achieve that level only Freddie could achieve.

We request that Freddie be posthumously knighted
